intro: Join us in celebrating our Indian wedding filled with beautiful Hindu rituals, love, colors, and joy. 🇮🇳🎊

events.description: A colorful celebration with music, dance, and beautiful henna designs.

events.description: A traditional haldi ritual to bless the couple.

events.title: 🐎 Baarat

events.description: The groom's grand procession with dancing and fun!

events.title: 💍 Wedding Ceremony
events.description: Join us as we tie the sacred knot with love and tradition.
